text:
Judson Company | Decatur, AL | REMOTE | Contractors Roles: Frontend Engineer

We're a small team (with an existing ecommerce business) working on a new platform for curated commerce. We handle product acquisition and fulfillment, and allow curators to create on-brand selling experiences.

Because we're a small team, we're looking for someone who is very comfortable taking charge of the frontend process, and also comfortable with some backend work if the need arises. In general, an ability to get things done will go a long way.

Our Stack: - PHP 7 / JS / MySQL - Sphinx Search - Snowplow

Email Jud@Judson.biz - Would love to see any side projects, Github, past/current work.

https://judson.biz
